title: Rengar's Q
body: Since it's like an auto attack, why doesn't it work on towers? Also when you EMP Q a tower the attack speed doesn't add on until you hit a minion first, why is it like that? D:

replies.body: The backdoor power will be too strong because u might one shot towers with rengar 3Qs combo

Because Rengar would take town towers way too fast, the attack speed doesn't work because you have not actually used your Q yet, you Q the tower but it never actually works all you did was a basic attack, killing the minion first actually procs everything the Q does.
